reviewText: Excellent showing of some great soaring!!!

Here's a wonderful introduction to the world of gliding/soaring by a glider pilot who's a videographer and featuring several of the world's best pilots. There's plenty of exceptional in-flight photography as well as preparation, pilot briefing, ground work and post flight conversation. Whether you know nothing about flying or you're a pilot you'll enjoy and appreciate this program.
This is a documentary that I purchased and have watched countless times. Every time I watch it is like a first again. I can't get enough of the beauty of the PA ridges and sport of soaring.
